overview_of_class: Principles and applications of analytical methods, with emphasis on advanced separation science, dynamic electrochemistry, and advanced mass spectrometry.
name: Analytical Chemistry
title: WCAS CHEM 329-0-20 Analytical Chemistry

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Principles and applications of analytical methods, with emphasis on advanced separation science, dynamic electrochemistry, and advanced mass spectrometry.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: Prerequisites for Chem 329-0: Chem 342-1 or Chem 342-2; or by permission of instructor

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value: Class materials will be provided by the instructor.
